mapper.sql: id, team_id, submitter_id, application_number, currency_id, department_id, category_id, receiver, current_node, state, inserttime, updatetime, finishtime
mapper.select: select a.id,submitter_id,e.name as submitterName,a.application_number as applicationNo, b.name as payCategory,cause, c.name as enterDepartment,d.name as currencyName, d.type as currencyType,receiver,receiver_msg as receiverMsg, a.remark,attach_url as attachUrl,a.inserttime as commitTime , a.state,case when f.approver_id =#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.state=0 then 1 else 0 end as canApprove, h.name as airDropTaskName,airdroptask_id from process a join approval_category b on a.category_id =b.id JOIN department c on a.department_id =c.id join currency d on a.currency_id =d.id join member e on a.submitter_id =e.user_id LEFT JOIN process_node f on a.id=f.process_id and a.current_node =f.`no` left join process_node g on a.id=g.process_id and g.approver_id= #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} left join airdrop_task h on a.airdroptask_id=h.id where a.id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and(g.id is not null or a.submitter_id=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

select (@rowNum:=@rowNum+1) rm ,t.*,(select count(1) from process where submitter_id=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.team_id=#{teamId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) count
from ( select a.id,e.name as submitterName, d.name as currencyName, receiver_msg as receiverMsg, a.inserttime as commitTime , a.state from process a
join currency d on a.currency_id =d.id join member e on a.submitter_id =e.user_id
where a.submitter_id=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.team_id=#{teamId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by a.inserttime desc ) t,(SELECT @rowNum:=0) b

select (@rowNum:=@rowNum+1) rm ,t.*,(select count(1) from process a JOIN process_node f on a.id=f.process_id and f.approver_id=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and f.state=#{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} where a.state in(0,1) and a.team_id=#{teamId,jdbcType=INTEGER}) count
from ( select a.id,e.name as submitterName, d.name as currencyName, receiver_msg as receiverMsg, a.inserttime as commitTime , a.state from process a
join currency d on a.currency_id =d.id join member e on a.submitter_id =e.user_id JOIN process_node f on a.id=f.process_id and f.approver_id=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and f.state=#{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} where a.state in(0,1) and a.team_id=#{teamId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by a.inserttime desc ) t,(SELECT @rowNum:=0) b
mapper.insert: insert into process (id, team_id, submitter_id, application_number, currency_id, department_id, category_id, receiver, current_node, state, inserttime, updatetime, finishtime, cause, receiver_msg, remark, attach_url) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teamId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{submitterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{applicationNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currencyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currentNode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inserttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{finishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cause,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{receiverMsg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{attachUrl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
INSERT INTO process_node(process_id,`no`,approver_id) SELECT #{processId,jdbcType=INTEGER},no,approver_id FROM flow_node where flow_id= #{flowId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and state=0

mapper.update:
update process
team_id = #{teamId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
submitter_id = #{submitterId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
application_number = #{applicationNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
currency_id = #{currencyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
receiver = #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
current_node = #{currentNode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
inserttime = #{inserttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
finishtime = #{finishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cause = #{cause,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
receiver_msg = #{receiverMsg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
attach_url = #{attachUrl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
airdroptask_id = #{airDropTaskId,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update process set team_id = #{teamId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, submitter_id = #{submitterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, application_number = #{applicationNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, currency_id = #{currencyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, receiver = #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, current_node = #{currentNode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inserttime = #{inserttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, finishtime = #{finishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cause = #{cause,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, receiver_msg = #{receiverMsg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, attach_url = #{attachUrl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
